Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.HealthBytes.executable.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Game
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The main Game class for Cyber Case. Controls program flow and JFrame.

    Course Info:

    ICS4U0 - Krasteva, V.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    (Project Manager) Russell Leong, (Project Member) Liam Telenko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
